com.soa.security.spi

Interface ISecurityModuleProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtensibleSecurityModuleProvider

    public interface ISecurityModuleProvider
    This is the provider interface for security module plugin.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAuthorizationAuthority createAuthorizationAuthority()
      Create a IAuthorizattinAuthority.
      IdentitySource createIdentitySource()
      Create a IdentitySource for browsing user.
      javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule createInteractiveLoginModule()
      Create a LoginModule for console login.
      javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule createLoginModule()
      Create a LoginModule for web serivce authentication.
      void init(IProviderConfigContext config)
      This method will be called when security module is intialized, other methods will will be called only when this method finishes.
      void shutdown()
      This method will be called when the security module needs to be destroyed

    • Method Detail

      • createLoginModule

        javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule createLoginModule()
        Create a LoginModule for web serivce authentication. Each time is method is called, a new LoginModule instance should be returned. Return null if the security module does not support authentication.
        Returns:

      • createInteractiveLoginModule

        javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule createInteractiveLoginModule()
        Create a LoginModule for console login. Each time this method is called, a new LoginModule instance should be returned. Return null if the security module does not support authentication.
        Returns:

      • createAuthorizationAuthority

        IAuthorizationAuthority createAuthorizationAuthority()
        Create a IAuthorizattinAuthority. Multiple calls of this method can return a shared instance. Return null if the security module does not support authorization.
        Returns:

      • createIdentitySource

        IdentitySource createIdentitySource()
        Create a IdentitySource for browsing user. Multiple calls of this method can return a shared instance. Return null if the security module does not support identity browsing.
        Returns:

      • init

        void init(IProviderConfigContext config)
   throws GException
        This method will be called when security module is intialized, other methods will will be called only when this method finishes.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration and context information for the security module.
        Throws:
        GException

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        This method will be called when the security module needs to be destroyed
